jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well, Please find the job description below; if you are interested, kindly let me know. Title: Java backend developer Duration: Contract Location: Bentonville, AR (Onsite) Client: UST Locals Required. Except OPT and H1T, All Work Authorization is Workable While sharing the resume, Please do mention the candidate location and Work Authorization. Job Description : Client is looking for an independent Java backend developer to work on a multi-vendor multi-geo team helping to build a NextGen high scale enterprise application. Skills and experiences: • 6+ years of experience in IT with 3+ years of experience in Java and Springboot • Solid experience in large scale distributed systems and event-driven architectures • Experience in taking ownership and delivering work product from requirement with minimal supervision • Experience with module designing, code reviews, unit testing and deployment Mandatory skills Java, Spring boot, REST API, JSON, Junit, SQL server Additional skills : Azure, Git, Kubernetes, Helm, Terraform, Maven, Jenkins, Postman, Grafana Waiting for your response. Please share your available time so I can contact you directly by phone. Best Regards, Dharani K Technical Recruiter VDart Inc Email: dharani.k@vdartinc.com LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/dharani-krishnasamy-396116178/ Website: www.vdart.com
